DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of target organs damage in hypertensive patients with no known cardiovascular (CV) or renal disease, stratified according to level of blood pressure control
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Target Organs Damage in Hypertensive Patients
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of essential hypertension (treated or untreated); HT not discovered on the day of the consultation; no documented clinical cardiovascular or renal disease.
